fw.name: Tessellation
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATBodyTessellator
class.abstract: Class defining a Tessellation operator on a body.

constructor.name: CATBodyTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATBodyTessellator with an infinite step.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the tessellation point numbers on an edge relative to an adjacent face point.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the result (in floats) associated with a topological edge of the input body.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the results (in doubles) associated with a topological edge of the input body.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a topological edge of the input body.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a topological face of the input body.

method.name: GetVertex
method.abstract: Retrieves the result associated with a topological vertex of the input body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> CATBodyTessellator.

method.name: SetStep
method.abstract: Defines a finite step for <tt>this</tt> CATBodyTessellator.

class.name: CATCellTessellator
class.abstract: Class defining a Tessellation operator on a cell.

constructor.name: CATCellTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATCellTessellator with an infinite step.

constructor.name: CATCellTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATCellTessellator with an infinite step.

constructor.name: CATCellTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATCellTessellator with an infinite step.

constructor.name: CATCellTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATCellTessellator with an infinite step.

method.name: AddEdge
method.abstract: Adds another edge to <tt>this</tt> CATCellTessellator.

method.name: AddFace
method.abstract: Adds another face to <tt>this</tt> CATCellTessellator.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the result (in floats) associated with a topological edge of the input cells.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the results (in doubles) associated with a topological edge of the input cells.

method.name: GetEdge
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a topological edge of the input cells.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a topological face of the input cells.

method.name: GetVertex
method.abstract: Retrieves the result associated with a topological vertex of the input cells.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> CATCellTessellator.

method.name: SetOutputMode
method.abstract: Defines Output mode for triangulation.

method.name: SetStep
method.abstract: Defines a finite step for <tt>this</tt> CATCellTessellator.

class.name: CATCurveTessellator
class.abstract: Class defining a tessellation operator on curves.

constructor.name: CATCurveTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATCurveTessellator with an infinite step.

method.name: AddCurve
method.abstract: Adds an other curve to <tt>this</tt> CATCurveTessellator.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Retrieves the results (in floats) associated with a curve.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Retrieves the results (in doubles) associated with a curve.

method.name: GetCurve
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a curve.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> CATCurveTessellator.

method.name: SetStep
method.abstract: Defines a finite step for <tt>this</tt> CATCurveTessellator.

class.name: CATSurfaceTessellator
class.abstract: Class defining a tessellation operator on surfaces.

constructor.name: CATSurfaceTessellator
constructor.abstract: Constructs a CATSurfaceTessellator with an infinite step.

method.name: AddSurface
method.abstract: Adds an other surface to <tt>this</tt> CATSurfaceTessellator.

method.name: GetSurface
method.abstract: Retrieves the results associated with a surface.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> CATSurfaceTessellator.

method.name: SetStep
method.abstract: Defines a finite step for <tt>this</tt> CATCurveTessellator.

class.name: CATTessEdgeIter
class.abstract: Class that outputs the point tessellation numbers corresponding to the the points on a given edge.

method.name: GetEdgeNbPts
method.abstract: Returns the number of tesselation points for the edge relative to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetEdgeNuPts
method.abstract: Returns the tessellation point numbers for the edge relative to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetEdgeW
method.abstract: Returns the tessellation point parameters for the edge relative to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to an adjacent face.

method.name: GetPCurve
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to a PCurve.

method.name: GetSameSens
method.abstract: Returns a CATBoolean is TRUE if the tessellation point numbers for the edge and the Edge are traveling throughtthe same sense.

class.name: CATTessFanIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the fans resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetFanAllNuPts
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the points ranks for all the fans.

method.name: GetFanNbPts
method.abstract: UP TO CATIA V5R17 Returns the number of points of the current fan.

method.name: GetFanNbPts
method.abstract: FROM CATIA V5R17 Returns the number of points of the current fan.

method.name: GetFanNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as int) defining the current fan.

method.name: GetFanNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as CATLONG32) defining the current fan.

method.name: GetNbFan
method.abstract: Returns the number of fans.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next fan.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATTessPointIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the points resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetNbPoint
method.abstract: Returns the number of computed points.

method.name: GetPointNor
method.abstract: Retrieves a pointer to the normal at the current point.

method.name: GetPointNorAll
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the normal at each point.

method.name: GetPointNu
method.abstract: Returns the rank of the current point.

method.name: GetPointUv
method.abstract: Returns the parameters of the current point (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointUvAll
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the parameters of all the points (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointXyz
method.abstract: Returns the Cartesian coordinates of the current point.

method.name: GetPointXyzAll
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the Cartesian coordinates of all the points.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next point.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATTessPointPolyIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the points resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Returns the CATFace of the current point (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointNor
method.abstract: Retrieves a pointer to the normal at the current point.

method.name: GetPointUv
method.abstract: Returns the parameters of the current point (in case of a face or a surface).

method.name: GetPointXyz
method.abstract: Returns the Cartesian coordinates of the current point.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next point.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATTessPolyIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the polygons resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetNbPoly
method.abstract: Returns the number of polygons.

method.name: GetPolyAllNuPts
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the points ranks for all the polygons.

method.name: GetPolyNbPts
method.abstract: Returns the number of points of the current polygon.

method.name: GetPolyNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as int) defining the current polygon.

method.name: GetPolyNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as CATLONG32) defining the current polygon.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next polygon.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATTessStripeIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the strips resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetNbStri
method.abstract: Returns the number of strips.

method.name: GetStriAllNuPts
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the points ranks for all the strips.

method.name: GetStriNbPts
method.abstract: FROM CATIA V5R17 Returns the number of points of the current strip.

method.name: GetStriNbPts
method.abstract: UP TO CATIA V5R17 Returns the number of points of the current strip.

method.name: GetStriNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as int) defining the current strip.

method.name: GetStriNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as CATLONG32) defining the current strip.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next strip.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATTessTrianIter
class.abstract: Class defining the iterator on the triangles resulting from a Tessellation operator.

method.name: GetNbTrian
method.abstract: Returns the number of triangles.

method.name: GetTrianAllNuPts
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the points ranks for all the triangles.

method.name: GetTrianNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as int) defining the current triangle.

method.name: GetTrianNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as CATLONG32) defining the current triangle.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next triangle.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.

class.name: CATTessVertexIter
class.abstract: Class that outputs the point tessellation numbers corresponding to the the points on a given vertex.

method.name: GetFace
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the current face.

method.name: GetNbFace
method.abstract: Returns the number of faces.

method.name: GetPoec
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to a PointOnEdgeCurve for the current face.

method.name: GetVertexAllNuPts
method.abstract: Globally retrieves the points ranks for all the faces.

method.name: GetVertexNuPts
method.abstract: Retrieves the points ranks (as int) defining the current face.

method.name: GetVertexXyz
method.abstract: Returns the Cartesian coordinates of the current point.

method.name: GoToNext
method.abstract: Skips to the next face.

method.name: IsExhausted
method.abstract: Tests whether the list is completed.

method.name: Reset
method.abstract: Resets the iterator to the beginning.
